translations: 用喷枪喷，用气笔修（照片）；粉饰

sentences.sentence: Other parenting and baby magazines claimed they did not airbrush pictures of babies but would remove "dribble".
sentences.translation: 其他的育儿和婴儿杂志宣称他们没有修改婴儿的图片，但是可能会去除“口水”。

sentences.sentence: They know what to remember and what to airbrush out.
sentences.translation: 他们知道应该去记住什么，也知道应该去抹杀什么。

sentences.sentence: The strands of gray somebody somewhere will airbrush out.
sentences.translation: 换作别人，会用几缕灰发在某处遮住的。
